info.title: Your pet API
info.description: This is API for selling pets, adding them to favorites, describing your pet, etc.

get.summary: Get notices by category and/or search parameters

patch.summary: Add notice to favorite by id
Remove notice from favorite by id

title.example: Cute cat looking for a home

comments.example: Rich would be the perfect addition to an active family that loves to play and go on walks. I bet he would love having a doggy playmate too!

idUsersAddedFavorite.description: User's id who added notice favorite
